title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Jul 13 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Jul 13 2022
description:
9.1% Inflation! How bad will the Biden recession get? "Read the polls, Jack!" Delusional Biden snaps at reporter. Monumental realignment: Dems are the party of white woke college grads, losing minority and working-class voters to GOP. #Science: Boys have penises, girls have vaginas is the commonsense phrase on Clay's shirt. Clay and Buck take a call from an ob-gyn medical assistant who confirms men are men and women are women. Senator Dr. Rand Paul asks why the flu shot changes every year, but they want you to get 4 shots of the same covid vaccine.

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
